Description: Fragment of neck and flattened handle, with gradual curve, of a pottery transport amphora. Clay near pink; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Names in Schion- are not attested, nor (if it is merely the nu that is retrograde) any in Schino-, though this form would be more comprehensible.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (331)
